Name: Thunder and Eternity
Title: Dream of Evanescent Eternity
Desc: "It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

Talent.Name: Thunder and Eternity
Talent.Desc: Convert all your Elemental Dice to $[K411].\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#3403}Inazuman characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K411.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>
K411.Desc: The {SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element can be considered as any kind of element, and can be used to pay for costs of various kinds.
